casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Louis M. ACERRA. (Richard K. Litwin-Petitioner) C-943 September Term 2017
080497 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001955-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
